an6.16:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
an6.16:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena nakulapitā gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
an6.16:1.3: Atha kho nakulamātā gahapatānī nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
an6.16:2.4: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:2.5: ‘na nakulamātā gahapatānī mamaccayena sakkhissati dārake posetuṃ, gharāvāsaṃ santharitun’ti.
an6.16:2.6: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:2.7: Kusalāhaṃ, gahapati, kappāsaṃ kantituṃ veṇiṃ olikhituṃ.
an6.16:2.8: Sakkomahaṃ, gahapati, tavaccayena dārake posetuṃ, gharāvāsaṃ santharituṃ.
an6.16:2.9: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:3.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:3.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:3.4: Tvañceva kho, gahapati, jānāsi ahañca, yaṃ no soḷasavassāni gahaṭṭhakaṃ brahmacariyaṃ samāciṇṇaṃ.
an6.16:3.5: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:4.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:4.2: ‘nakulamātā gahapatānī mamaccayena na dassanakāmā bhavissati bhagavato na dassanakāmā bhikkhusaṅghassā’ti.
an6.16:4.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:4.4: Ahañhi, gahapati, tavaccayena dassanakāmatarā ceva bhavissāmi bhagavato, dassanakāmatarā ca bhikkhusaṅghassa.
an6.16:4.5: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:5.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:5.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:5.4: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā sīlesu paripūrakāriniyo, ahaṃ tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:5.5: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—ayaṃ so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye—taṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchatu.
an6.16:5.6: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:6.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:6.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:6.4: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā lābhiniyo ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, ahaṃ tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:6.5: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—ayaṃ so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye—taṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchatu.
an6.16:6.6: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:7.1: Siyā kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:7.2: ‘na nakulamātā gahapatānī imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane viharatī’ti.
an6.16:7.3: Na kho panetaṃ, gahapati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
an6.16:7.4: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato sāvikā gihī odātavasanā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane viharanti, ahaṃ tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:7.5: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā—ayaṃ so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye—taṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchatu.
an6.16:7.6: Tasmātiha tvaṃ, gahapati, mā sāpekkho kālamakāsi.
an6.16:8.1: Atha kho nakulapituno gahapatissa nakulamātarā gahapatāniyā iminā ovādena ovadiyamānassa so ābādho ṭhānaso paṭippassambhi.
an6.16:8.2: Vuṭṭhahi ca nakulapitā gahapati tamhā ābādhā;
an6.16:8.3: tathā pahīno ca pana nakulapituno gahapatissa so ābādho ahosi.
an6.16:8.4: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā daṇḍamolubbha yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an6.16:9.2: Yassa te nakulamātā gahapatānī anukampikā atthakāmā ovādikā anusāsikā.
an6.16:9.3: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā sīlesu paripūrakāriniyo, nakulamātā gahapatānī tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:9.4: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā lābhiniyo ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, nakulamātā gahapatānī tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:9.5: Yāvatā kho, gahapati, mama sāvikā gihī odātavasanā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ogādhappattā patigādhappattā assāsappattā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane viharanti, nakulamātā gahapatānī tāsaṃ aññatarā.
an6.16:9.6: Lābhā te, gahapati, suladdhaṃ te, gahapati.
an6.16:9.7: Yassa te nakulamātā gahapatānī anukampikā atthakāmā ovādikā anusāsikā”ti.
